job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to architect the future of education? As our Lead Product Engineer, you'll be the mastermind behind AI-powered learning experiences that are reshaping how students engage with knowledge. If you're a top-tier engineer who thrives on autonomy, strategic influence, and complex technical challenges, this is your chance to make history.

   You'll be the driving force behind groundbreaking products like:
     * TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life through AI in a TikTok-style learning platform.
     * TeachTales: Crafting personalized, magical storytelling experiences that boost comprehension.
     * TimeBack: Developing an AI learning copilot that proactively coaches students within existing apps.
     * Athena: Harnessing AI-generated videos and tests to deliver measurable academic outcomes.

   Your technical decisions will directly shape these products, impacting thousands of students' learning journeys. You'll have the freedom to innovate, the responsibility to deliver, and the opportunity to revolutionize education through cutting-edge technology. If you're ready to lead the charge in educational AI, we're ready for you.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect the Future: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features that will shape the long-term trajectory of our AI-powered educational products.
     * Drive Technical Strategy: Lead high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability, setting the course for our technological evolution.
     * Collaborate and Innovate: Work closely with product teams to refine requirements, lead technical discussions, and align cutting-edge features with our ambitious product goals.
     * Ensure Excellence: Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues to deliver a seamless learning experience.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Chasing Short-Term Trends: We're not interested in flavor-of-the-month technologies. Your focus will be on sustainable, impactful innovations that stand the test of time.
     * Mundane Maintenance: Say goodbye to tedious infrastructure issues. Our AI-first approach automates the routine, freeing you to tackle high-impact challenges.
     * Irrelevant Projects: You won't be wasting time on internal IT systems or outsourced work. Every line of code you write will have real-world impact on learners.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your time and expertise. Expect focused, productive collaborations instead of time-consuming bureaucracy., Your primary responsibility is to drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered educational products, ensuring they deliver transformative learning experiences while maintaining scalability, stability, and long-term growth potential. You will be the key architect translating our vision into robust, innovative technical solutions that revolutionize how students interact with and absorb knowledge.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Product Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Ready to architect the future of education? As our Lead Product Engineer, you'll be the mastermind behind AI-powered learning experiences that are reshaping how students engage with knowledge. If you're a top-tier engineer who thrives on autonomy, strategic influence, and complex technical challenges, this is your chance to make history.

   You'll be the driving force behind groundbreaking products like:
     * TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life through AI in a TikTok-style learning platform.
     * TeachTales: Crafting personalized, magical storytelling experiences that boost comprehension.
     * TimeBack: Developing an AI learning copilot that proactively coaches students within existing apps.
     * Athena: Harnessing AI-generated videos and tests to deliver measurable academic outcomes.

   Your technical decisions will directly shape these products, impacting thousands of students' learning journeys. You'll have the freedom to innovate, the responsibility to deliver, and the opportunity to revolutionize education through cutting-edge technology. If you're ready to lead the charge in educational AI, we're ready for you.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect the Future: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features that will shape the long-term trajectory of our AI-powered educational products.
     * Drive Technical Strategy: Lead high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability, setting the course for our technological evolution.
     * Collaborate and Innovate: Work closely with product teams to refine requirements, lead technical discussions, and align cutting-edge features with our ambitious product goals.
     * Ensure Excellence: Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues to deliver a seamless learning experience.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Chasing Short-Term Trends: We're not interested in flavor-of-the-month technologies. Your focus will be on sustainable, impactful innovations that stand the test of time.
     * Mundane Maintenance: Say goodbye to tedious infrastructure issues. Our AI-first approach automates the routine, freeing you to tackle high-impact challenges.
     * Irrelevant Projects: You won't be wasting time on internal IT systems or outsourced work. Every line of code you write will have real-world impact on learners.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your time and expertise. Expect focused, productive collaborations instead of time-consuming bureaucracy., Your primary responsibility is to drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered educational products, ensuring they deliver transformative learning experiences while maintaining scalability, stability, and long-term growth potential. You will be the key architect translating our vision into robust, innovative technical solutions that revolutionize how students interact with and absorb knowledge.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes designing and implementing AI-powered learning experiences using generative models, as evidenced by projects like TeachTap and TeachTales. The responsibilities include architecting features, driving technical strategy for AI products, and ensuring product stability and performance, aligning with the core duties of a GenAI Engineer.
